text: The Westchester Indians were an American basketball team based in White Plains, New York that was a member of the American Basketball League. During the 1944/45 season, the team became the New York Gothams on January 20, 1945. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg. Season !Playoffs |- |1944/45 |ABL |N/A |N/A |} Category:Basketball teams in New York (state) Category:White Plains, New York Category:Defunct basketball teams in the United States Category:Sports in Westchester County, New York Category:Basketball teams in the New York metropolitan area
title: Westchester Indians
